<p>Hi 👋, I am <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Plopix-black?style=flat-square&logo=twitter' alt='Plopix'/><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Sebastien Morel-black?style=flat-square&logo=linkedin' alt='Sebastien Morel'/>, I am CTO at <a href='_blank' href='http://www.novactive.us' title='Novactive'>Novactive</a>by <a href='_blank' href='https://www.nextedia.com' title='Nextedia'>Nextedia</a>. I live in California, and I come from France 🥖.</p><p>🦚 proud maintainer or co-maintainer on those projects: <a href="https://plopix.github.io/" title="">https://plopix.github.io/</a>.

💯 my favorite technologies: <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/PHP-7.4-green?style=flat-square&logo=php&labelColor=black' alt='PHP - 7.4'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Symfony-5.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=symfony&labelColor=black' alt='Symfony - 5.x'/>, really often, I base my developments on top of <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/eZ Platform-3.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=black' alt='eZ Platform - 3.x'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Contentful-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,' alt='Contentful'/>.</p><p>🚀 I always push to ship on <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Platform.sh-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,' alt='Platform.sh'/>, but we have some projects on <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/AWS-black?style=flat-square&logo=amazon-aws' alt='AWS'/>.</p><p>🐳 and for local developments that's of course <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Docker-black?style=flat-square&logo=docker' alt='Docker'/>.</p><p>🧰 my toolbox is my <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/MySQL-8.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=mysql&labelColor=black' alt='MySQL - 8.x'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/MongoDB-4.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=mongodb&labelColor=black' alt='MongoDB - 4.x'/>, <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Redis-black?style=flat-square&logo=redis' alt='Redis'/>, <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/ElasticSearch-black?style=flat-square&logo=elasticsearch' alt='ElasticSearch'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Solr-black?style=flat-square&logo=apache-solr' alt='Solr'/>, <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Algolia-black?style=flat-square&logo=algolia' alt='Algolia'/> all the time with <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Varnish-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,' alt='Varnish'/>.</p><p>🧪 for CI, it's <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Git-black?style=flat-square&logo=git' alt='Git'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-black?style=flat-square&logo=github' alt='Github'/> and <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Travis-black?style=flat-square&logo=travis' alt='Travis'/>. More and more <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Github Actions-black?style=flat-square&logo=github-actions' alt='Github Actions'/>. Occasionnaly <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Gitlab-black?style=flat-square&logo=gitlab' alt='Gitlab'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitbucket-black?style=flat-square&logo=bitbucket' alt='Bitbucket'/>.

🌉 When it comes to <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/HTML-black?style=flat-square&logo=html5' alt='HTML'/>  <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/CSS-black?style=flat-square&logo=css3' alt='CSS'/>, I use <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-black?style=flat-square&logo=typescript' alt='TypeScript'/> <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Javascript-ES6-green?style=flat-square&logo=javascript&labelColor=black' alt='Javascript - ES6'/> on top of <img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/React JS-black?style=flat-square&logo=react' alt='React JS'/> with<img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Bootstrap-black?style=flat-square&logo=bootstrap' alt='Bootstrap'/>.
</p>
